title: Noam Chomsky - Manufacturing Consent
description: Summary of Chomsky's analyses on how the corporate media functions. Excerpt from the documentary "Manufacturing Consent: Noam Chomsky and the Media" (1992). Watch the whole thing here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YHa6NflkW3Y
tags: Manufacturing Consent: The Political Economy Of The Mass Media (Book)
